required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Oxytocin on Hemodynamics in Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Myomectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Oxytocin on Hemodynamics in Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Myomectomy

brief_summary.textblock: This project will study the effect of oxytocin on hemodynamics in patients undergoing laparoscopic myomectomy, and how to prevent and manage such hemodynamic changes effectively.It provides a reference for the rational use of oxytocin in clinical practice, which can not only effectively contract the uterus and reduce bleeding, but also reduce the influence on hemodynamics.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of traditional hemodynamic parameters after oxytocin use during laparoscopic hysteromyomectomia.
primary_outcome.time_frame: "before induction", "before incision", "before oxytocin intramuscular injection", and "20 sec, 40 sec, 60 sec, 80 sec, 100 sec, 120 sec, 140 sec, 160 sec,180 sec after oxytocin intramuscular injection".
primary_outcome.description: Parameters including SBP, DBP, MAP (mmHg) were measured by a Mostcare hemodynamic monitor.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of traditional hemodynamic parameters after oxytocin use during laparoscopic hysteromyomectomia.
primary_outcome.time_frame: "before induction", "before incision", "before oxytocin intramuscular injection", and "20 sec, 40 sec, 60 sec, 80 sec, 100 sec, 120 sec, 140 sec, 160 sec,180 sec after oxytocin intramuscular injection".
primary_outcome.description: HR (beats/min) was measured by a Mostcare hemodynamic monitor.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of volume management parameters after oxytocin use during laparoscopic hysteromyomectomia.
primary_outcome.time_frame: "before induction", "before incision", "before oxytocin intramuscular injection", and "20 sec, 40 sec, 60 sec, 80 sec, 100 sec, 120 sec, 140 sec, 160 sec,180 sec after oxytocin intramuscular injection".
primary_outcome.description: SVV (%) was measured by a Mostcare hemodynamic monitor.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of volume management parameters after oxytocin use during laparoscopic hysteromyomectomia.
primary_outcome.time_frame: "before induction", "before incision", "before oxytocin intramuscular injection", and "20 sec, 40 sec, 60 sec, 80 sec, 100 sec, 120 sec, 140 sec, 160 sec,180 sec after oxytocin intramuscular injection".
primary_outcome.description: SVRI (dynes-sec/cm-5) was measured by a Mostcare hemodynamic monitor.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of volume management parameters after oxytocin use during laparoscopic hysteromyomectomia.
primary_outcome.time_frame: "before induction", "before incision", "before oxytocin intramuscular injection", and "20 sec, 40 sec, 60 sec, 80 sec, 100 sec, 120 sec, 140 sec, 160 sec,180 sec after oxytocin intramuscular injection".
primary_outcome.description: CI (l/min/m2) was measured by a Mostcare hemodynamic monitor.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of volume management parameters after oxytocin use during laparoscopic hysteromyomectomia.
primary_outcome.time_frame: "before induction", "before incision", "before oxytocin intramuscular injection", and "20 sec, 40 sec, 60 sec, 80 sec, 100 sec, 120 sec, 140 sec, 160 sec,180 sec after oxytocin intramuscular injection".
primary_outcome.description: CO (l/min) was measured by a Mostcare hemodynamic monitor.

arm_group.arm_group_label: group 2 with oxytocin 10 U IM + oxytocin 10 U IV
group 3 with oxytocin 20 U IM + oxytocin 0 U IV
group 4 with oxytocin 0 U IM + oxytocin 20 U IV

intervention.description: During the laparoscopic hysteromyomectomia operation, different doses of oxytocin was used with different routs.
intervention.arm_group_label: group 2 with oxytocin 10 U IM + oxytocin 10 U IV
group 3 with oxytocin 20 U IM + oxytocin 0 U IV
group 4 with oxytocin 0 U IM + oxytocin 20 U IV

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- General anesthesia for gynecological laparoscopic surgery,ASA I~III
Exclusion Criteria:
- Oxytocin use contraindications

facility.name: the Affiliated Hospital of Yangzhou University
